item.title: New look for my web site
item.description: Hello. This is my new web site. I built it using Hugo. I am using the Coder template. I will start writing new content on the blog soon. Regards

item.title: Contact
item.description: Hello You can send me a message here: hola@samueltoloza.cl

item.title: About
item.description: Hello. My name is Samuel Toloza. I’m from Chile. I’m a software developer. I have knowledge in: Java Python C#, Visual Basic, .NET Object Pascal PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MySQL Angular Web Scraping I have some applications published in PlayStore: Boleta de Honorarios Chile Farmacias CL Mi Github repo is tlzsystem If you have any project ideas, please contact me! Regards
